name: If Dogs Kite Fly
description:
You're a corgi with a kite on New Year's Eve, what could go wrong? Dodge tents and food trucks as you try to prevent your kite from being hit by fireworks. This game was developed as part of the Bullet Hell Jam 2021.

Controls: 

Mouse movement left and right will move the dog and kite in opposite directions simultaneously. 

The scroll wheel can be used to let slack out for the kite or reel it in. 

A game by:

Alex Bakos

Annelise Belmonte

Jes Klass

Peter McDonald
